Can't change avatar

8
Revial
Thursday, December 21st, 2017, 7:54:57 PM

I've tried a multitude of fixes but I can't seem to change my avatar. Not really an issue but I wanted to see if anyone else was having this odd issue as well as make someone aware of it.

If this was posted before, sorry.

ondreian
Thursday, December 21st, 2017, 8:34:42 PM

May be the image you tried to make your avatar is too large of a file.

Revial
Thursday, December 21st, 2017, 9:39:40 PM

@ondreian said in Can't change avatar:

May be the image you tried to make your avatar is too large of a file.

Already attempted several sized avatars. It simply reverts back to the original.

Sabotage
Friday, December 22nd, 2017, 2:36:58 AM

when you go to edit profile, then change picture do you have uploaded picture selected and not default icon?

Revial
Friday, December 22nd, 2017, 11:43:04 AM

@sabotage said in Can't change avatar:

when you go to edit profile, then change picture do you have uploaded picture selected and not default icon?

I've deleted this picture, saved the changes, uploaded my desired picture and it simply reverts back to this one.

Naamit
Saturday, December 23rd, 2017, 5:50:01 PM

@Revial I had an issue like this and it turned out to be a locally stored cookie on my machine that kept showing it as the old one. After you change the image, clear cache/cookies, close all browser sessions and try again with a fresh, private/incognito window.

Revial
Saturday, December 23rd, 2017, 9:13:16 PM

@naamit This worked, thank you. Much better to see this avatar over the old one.

Naamit
Saturday, December 23rd, 2017, 9:14:16 PM

Cheers!
